topics.title: Bypass Capacitors
topics.description: The use of bypass capacitors to provide current and suppress frequencies.
evidence_quotes: A capacitor is placed in the circuit where it will suppress or bypass signals.
They act as a frequency-dependent resistor.

topics.title: Capacitor Selection
topics.description: The importance of selecting the right capacitor for decoupling applications.
evidence_quotes: The capacitors should be placed as close as possible to the ICs.
The first and most important aspect is to choose capacitors which has low equivalent series resistance.

topics.title: Decoupling Capacitors
topics.description: The use of decoupling capacitors to bypass noise and suppress frequencies.
evidence_quotes: It needs remarkable amount of current immediately.
A capacitor is placed in the circuit where it will suppress or bypass signals.

topics.title: Noise Suppression
topics.description: The importance of noise suppression and the use of decoupling capacitors to achieve it.
evidence_quotes: Noise through the power lines is completely unpredictable and changes in nature every time.
So, these capacitors are connected in parallel with the ICs.
